title: Fetch and Merge Changes
description: The 'git pull' command fetches updates from the remote repository and merges them into the current branch.
story: Alice wants to update her local branch with the latest changes from the remote main branch. She uses 'git pull'.

game.hint: Use 'git pull' to fetch and merge updates from the remote branch.

title: Upload Changes to Remote
description: The 'git push' command uploads your local branch commits to the remote repository.
story: Alice finishes her work on the 'feature-login' branch and pushes it to the remote repository using 'git push'.

game.hint: Use 'git push' to upload your local changes to the remote branch.

title: Retrieve Updates Without Merging
description: The 'git fetch' command retrieves updates from the remote repository without merging them into your current branch.
story: Alice fetches updates from the remote repository to inspect changes before merging them locally.

game.hint: Use 'git fetch' to download changes from the remote without applying them.

title: Fetch and Reapply Commits
description: The 'git pull --rebase' command fetches updates from the remote repository and reapplies your local commits on top.
story: Alice wants to reapply her local changes after fetching updates from the remote repository to avoid unnecessary merge commits. She uses 'git pull --rebase'.

game.hint: Use 'git pull --rebase' to fetch updates and reapply your commits.

title: Force Push Changes
description: The 'git push --force' command forcefully overwrites the remote branch with your local changes.
story: Alice accidentally made a mistake in her commits and rewrote history. She uses 'git push --force' to update the remote repository.

game.hint: Use 'git push --force' to overwrite the remote branch with your changes.

title: Resolve Conflicts While Pulling
description: Sometimes conflicts occur during a 'git pull'. You need to resolve them manually before completing the merge.
story: While pulling the latest updates, Alice encounters conflicts. She resolves the conflicts and completes the merge.

game.hint: Use 'git pull' and resolve conflicts to update your branch.

title: View Remote Repositories
description: The 'git remote -v' command displays the URLs of remote repositories associated with your project.
story: Alice wants to see all the remote repositories linked to her project, so she uses 'git remote -v'.

game.hint: Use 'git remote -v' to list remote repository URLs.

title: Push All Tags
description: The 'git push --tags' command uploads all local tags to the remote repository.
story: Alice creates several tags for versioning and pushes them all to the remote repository using 'git push --tags'.

game.hint: Use 'git push --tags' to upload all tags to the remote repository.

title: Fetch All Remotes
description: The 'git fetch --all' command retrieves updates from all remote repositories linked to the project.
story: Alice wants to fetch updates from all remotes in her project. She uses 'git fetch --all'.

game.hint: Use 'git fetch --all' to download updates from all remotes.

title: Add a Remote Repository
description: The 'git remote add' command links a new remote repository to your project.
story: Alice clones a project but wants to add another remote for her forked repository. She uses 'git remote add'.

game.hint: Use 'git remote add' to link a new remote repository.
